resources.string: Pad Thai is typical street fare across Thailand—and it\'s probably the #1 order at your local Thai restaurant. In fact, this popular stir-fried noodle dish is the national dish of Thailand. But what exactly is it about Pad Thai that makes it so delicious? Bold, umami flavors and a variety of textures make Pad Thai into a comforting meal that everyone can love.

Delicious bits of chicken with a salt and pepper crust on a bed of fluffy rice. Wok fried spices and vegetables are mixed with battered chicken breast to create the ultimate combination of salt, spice and crunch.

Creamy avocadoes and tangy tomatoes are mixed with fresh lettuce to make a healthy and scrumptious meal. The salad is topped with a sumptuous caesar salad dressing and is dotted with seasoned breadcrumbs and chili flakes.
A vibrant image of a pad thai dish
